article.title: Lockheed Martin to Supply Gunnery Trainers to Saudi Arabia
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Orlando, Florida, was recently awarded a nearly $32 million contract to provide for the acquisition of four Mobile Advanced Gunnery Training Systems and eight Deployable Advanced Gunnery Training Systems, with new-equipment training and logistics support, for the kingdom of Saudi Arabia.Â The Program Executive Office of Simulation, Training and Instrumentation, Orlando, Florida, is the contracting activity.
